messages.content: As a student about to graduate, getting a good job is a priority for me - and we'll only see more jobs being created if we have a strong and growing economy. But I also care passionately about making our country fairer. That's why I back the Lib Dem plans to help the most disadvantaged children at school, invest more in the NHS and end the stigma attached to mental illness. If you want to see a growing economy AND investment in our NHS, then vote Lib Dem.

If you oppose a 'hard Brexit', think our National Health Service is worth fighting for, and want to protect our environment for the next generation - the choice is clear. For a country that's open, tolerant and united. Vote for the Lib Dems.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support a strong and growing economy to generate more jobs.
Invest more in the NHS and end the stigma attached to mental illness.
Help the most disadvantaged children at school.
Protect the environment for the next generation.

issues.economy: Support a strong and growing economy to generate more jobs.
issues.education: Help the most disadvantaged children at school.
issues.environment: Protect the environment for the next generation.
issues.health: Invest more in the NHS and end the stigma attached to mental illness.

endorsements.endorsement: As a student about to graduate, getting a good job is a priority for me - and we'll only see more jobs being created if we have a strong and growing economy. But I also care passionately about making our country fairer. That's why I back the Lib Dem plans to help the most disadvantaged children at school, invest more in the NHS and end the stigma attached to mental illness.

quotes.text: If you want to see a growing economy AND investment in our NHS, then vote Lib Dem.

images.caption: Marcus, a student, endorsing the Lib Dems for a stronger economy and a fairer society.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet promotes the Lib Dems as the party for a stronger economy and a fairer society, focusing on growing the economy, investing in health, education, and opposing a 'hard Brexit'.
